resources.string: When this feature is enabled, the application will try to automatically unlock the lock screen. The function may not work on all devices, and in those cases when you use a password, etc.
To change the entry into force, you must restart the proposal.

This parameter adjusts the frequency of calls to the accelerometer. The more often the accelerometer is accessed, the higher the accuracy of operation, but the discharge of the battery is correspondingly higher.
This parameter affects the devices waking angle with respect to the horizon. The red zone means at what angle the device will not wake up, and the green zone indicates the trigger zone.
Choose the frequency of treatment. 1 sec. = 1 000 000 ms.
